title: Product Card with Image
description: Design a product card showcasing an item with image, title, price, and a buy button. Reference image provided.
instructions:
Create a product card with:
- Product image (use: /assets/images/product-1.png)
- Product name: 'Wireless Headphones'
- Price: '$99.99'
- 'Add to Cart' button
- Card width: 280px
- Hover effect on button
- Clean, modern design
hints: Use overflow: hidden on card for clean edges

expectedSolution.html:
Wireless Headphones

$99.99

title: Hero Section with Background
description: Create an eye-catching hero section with a background image, heading, and call-to-action button.
instructions:
Build a hero section with:
- Background image (use: /assets/images/hero-bg-1.jpg)
- Overlay for text readability
- Main heading: 'Welcome to Our Platform'
- Subheading: 'Start your journey today'
- 'Get Started' button
- Centered content
- Full viewport height

expectedSolution.html:
Welcome to Our Platform

Start your journey today

title: Interactive Counter
description: Create a simple counter with increment and decrement buttons using JavaScript.
instructions:
Build a counter app with:
- Display showing current count (starts at 0)
- '+' button to increment
- '-' button to decrement
- Counter cannot go below 0
- Use provided icon images for buttons
- Center the counter on page

expectedSolution.html: 0

title: Contact Form with Validation
description: Build a complete contact form with client-side validation and styled error messages.
instructions:
Create a contact form with:
- Name, email, and message fields
- Submit button
- Validate: name (not empty), email (valid format), message (min 10 chars)
- Show error messages in red below fields
- Success message on valid submission
- Use provided form icon
hints: Use event.preventDefault() to stop form submission
Check email with regex or includes('@')

expectedSolution.html: Contact Us

title: Basic HTML Structure
description: Create a simple HTML page with proper document structure
instructions:
Create an HTML page with the following:
- DOCTYPE declaration
- HTML, head, and body tags
- Title: 'My First Webpage'
- A heading (h1) that says 'Welcome to HTML'
- A paragraph introducing yourself
hints: Remember to close all tags properly

expectedSolution.html:
Welcome to HTML

Hello! My name is [Your Name] and I'm learning HTML.

title: Text Formatting Elements
description: Use various HTML text formatting tags
instructions:
Create a page that demonstrates: - Bold text using - Italic text using - Underlined text using - Line breaks using
- Horizontal rule using
Write a short paragraph about your favorite hobby using these tags.
hints: Don't forget to use proper HTML structure

expectedSolution.html:
My Favorite Hobby

I love reading books! Fiction is my favorite genre.
My favorite author is J.K. Rowling.

Reading helps me relax and learn new things.

title: Lists in HTML
description: Create both ordered and unordered lists
instructions:
Create a webpage with:
- An unordered list of 5 fruits
- An ordered list of 5 steps to make a sandwich
- Use proper headings for each list

expectedSolution.html:
My Favorite Fruits

  • Apple
  • Banana
  • Orange
  • Mango
  • Strawberry

How to Make a Sandwich

  1. Get two slices of bread
  2. Spread butter on both slices
  3. Add cheese and vegetables
  4. Put the slices together
  5. Cut diagonally and serve

title: Links and Navigation
description: Create hyperlinks to different pages and websites
instructions:
Create a navigation menu with:
- Links to 3 popular websites (Google, YouTube, Wikipedia)
- Use target="_blank" to open in new tab
- Add a heading 'My Favorite Websites'
- Make each link descriptive

expectedSolution.html:
My Favorite Websites

  • Google - Search Engine
  • YouTube - Video Platform
  • Wikipedia - Free Encyclopedia

title: Basic HTML Table
description: Create a simple data table
instructions:
Create a table showing:
- Your weekly schedule (3 days, 3 time slots)
- Use <table>, <tr>, <th>, <td> tags
- Add a caption 'My Weekly Schedule'
- Include borders using border="1"
hints: Add border attribute to table tag

expectedSolution.html:
My Weekly Schedule
Time Monday Wednesday Friday
9:00 AM Math English Science
11:00 AM History Art Music
2:00 PM Sports Computer Library

title: CSS Basics - Text Styling
description: Apply basic CSS styling to text elements
instructions:
Create a page with:
- A heading with color: #2c3e50
- A paragraph with font-size: 18px and line-height: 1.6
- Use external CSS (in <style> tag)
- Apply font-family: Arial, sans-serif to body
hints: Use CSS selectors: h1, p, body
Remember to use semicolons after each property

expectedSolution.html:
Welcome to CSS

CSS makes web pages beautiful and engaging. With CSS, we can control colors, fonts, spacing, and much more!

title: CSS Box Model
description: Understand and apply margin, padding, and border
instructions:
Create a div with class 'box' that has:
- Width: 300px
- Padding: 20px
- Margin: 30px
- Border: 2px solid #3498db
- Background-color: #ecf0f1
- Add some text inside the div
hints: Remember: margin is outside, padding is inside

expectedSolution.html:
The Box Model

This box demonstrates margin, padding, and border properties.

title: CSS Colors and Backgrounds
description: Work with different color formats and background properties
instructions:
Create three divs with different background colors:
- First div: RGB color rgb(231, 76, 60)
- Second div: Hex color #27ae60
- Third div: Named color dodgerblue
- Each div should be 200px wide, 100px tall
- Add white text color to all divs
- Add some text in each div
hints: Use padding for better text visibility

expectedSolution.html:
RGB Color
Hex Color
Named Color

title: CSS Class and ID Selectors
description: Practice using class and ID selectors
instructions:
Create:
- A header with id='main-header', background: #34495e, color: white, padding: 20px
- Three paragraphs with class='info-text', color: #555, font-size: 16px
- One special paragraph with id='highlight', background: #f39c12, padding: 15px
hints: IDs are unique, classes can be reused

expectedSolution.html:
Understanding CSS Selectors

This is the first paragraph with info-text class.

This is the second paragraph with info-text class.

This is the third paragraph with info-text class.

This paragraph is special and highlighted!

title: CSS Text Alignment and Decoration
description: Apply text alignment and decoration properties
instructions:
Create a page with:
- A centered heading (h1) with text-decoration: underline
- A right-aligned paragraph
- A left-aligned paragraph with text-transform: uppercase
- A centered paragraph with letter-spacing: 2px

expectedSolution.html:
Text Styling Demo

This text is aligned to the right.

This text is in uppercase.

This text has letter spacing.

title: CSS Flexbox - Basic Layout
description: Create a horizontal layout using Flexbox
instructions:
Create a container with display: flex containing 3 boxes:
- Container: display: flex, justify-content: space-around, padding: 20px
- Each box: width: 150px, height: 150px, different background colors
- Add text in each box with centered alignment
hints: Use display: flex on the container
Use align-items: center for vertical centering

expectedSolution.html:
Box 1
Box 2
Box 3

title: CSS Grid - Basic Grid Layout
description: Create a simple grid layout with CSS Grid
instructions:
Create a grid container with:
- display: grid
- grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr)
- gap: 20px
- 6 grid items with different background colors
- Each item: padding: 20px, text-align: center
hints: gap property sets spacing between items

expectedSolution.html:
Item 1
Item 2
Item 3
Item 4
Item 5
Item 6

title: Responsive Navigation Bar
description: Create a horizontal navigation bar with hover effects
instructions:
Build a navigation bar with:
- Unordered list styled as horizontal menu
- list-style: none, display: flex
- Each link: padding: 15px 20px, text-decoration: none
- Hover effect: background-color change
- Nav background: #2c3e50, text color: white

expectedSolution.html:
• Home
  • About
  • Services
  • Contact

title: Card Component with Shadow
description: Create a styled card component
instructions:
Build a card with:
- Width: 300px, border-radius: 10px
- box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)
- Padding: 20px, background: white
- Card title (h3), description (p), and a button
- Button: padding 10px 20px, background #3498db, color white, border-radius 5px
- Hover effect on button

expectedSolution.html:
Product Card

This is a beautiful card component with shadow effects and hover states.

title: Centered Content Layout
description: Create a perfectly centered layout
instructions:
Create a centered container:
- Full viewport height (100vh)
- Use Flexbox to center content vertically and horizontally
- Inner box: 400px width, padding: 40px, background: white
- Add heading and paragraph inside
- Page background: linear-gradient
hints: Use display: flex with justify-content and align-items

expectedSolution.html:
Perfectly Centered

This content is centered both horizontally and vertically using Flexbox.

title: Responsive Image Gallery
description: Create a responsive image gallery using CSS Grid
instructions:
Build an image gallery:
- Grid with 3 columns on desktop
- Use grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr))
- Add 6 placeholder boxes (200px height, different colors)
- gap: 15px
- Each box should have border-radius: 8px
hints: Use different background colors for visual variety

expectedSolution.html:
Image 1
Image 2
Image 3
Image 4
Image 5
Image 6

title: Animated Button with Transitions
description: Create buttons with smooth CSS transitions
instructions:
Create 3 buttons with different hover effects:
- Button 1: Scale up (transform: scale(1.1))
- Button 2: Slide right (transform: translateX(10px))
- Button 3: Color transition
- All transitions: 0.3s ease
- Base style: padding 15px 30px, border-radius 25px, border: none
hints: Use transition property for smooth animations
Use transform for scale and translate

title: Responsive Pricing Cards
description: Create a set of pricing cards that adapt to screen size
instructions:
Build 3 pricing cards:
- Container: display flex, wrap on small screens
- Each card: width 300px, padding 30px, text-align center
- Include: title, price (large font), features list, button
- Middle card highlighted with different color
- box-shadow on all cards
hints: Use transform: translateY for highlight effect

expectedSolution.html:
Basic

$9.99
  • Feature 1
  • Feature 2
  • Feature 3

Pro

$19.99
  • All Basic Features
  • Feature 4
  • Feature 5

Enterprise

$29.99
  • All Pro Features
  • Feature 6
  • Priority Support

title: CSS Custom Properties (Variables)
description: Use CSS variables for theming
instructions:
Create a themed page using CSS variables:
- Define variables in :root for primary color, secondary color, spacing
- Create a header, main content, and footer using these variables
- Add a class .dark-theme that changes the variables
- Use var(--variable-name) to apply variables
hints: Create alternative theme with different values

expectedSolution.html:
CSS Custom Properties

Theme Example

This page uses CSS variables for consistent styling and easy theming.

© 2024 CSS Demo

title: Advanced Form Styling
description: Create a beautifully styled form with focus effects
instructions:
Build a contact form with:
- Input fields for name, email, message
- Styled inputs: padding 12px, border-radius 5px, border 2px solid #ddd
- Focus effects: border color change to primary color
- Submit button with hover effect
- Label styling with proper spacing
- Form container with box-shadow
hints: Use outline: none and add custom border

expectedSolution.html: Contact Us

title: CSS Keyframe Animations
description: Create animations using @keyframes
instructions:
Create animated elements:
- A box that bounces continuously
- Use @keyframes bounce with transform: translateY
- Animation: 2s infinite ease-in-out
- Box: 100px square, background gradient
- Add animation-play-state: paused on hover
hints: Use animation property to apply it
Use transform: translateY for vertical movement

expectedSolution.html: Hover to Pause

title: Advanced Grid - Grid Template Areas
description: Create complex layouts using grid-template-areas
instructions:
Build a website layout with:
- Header across full width
- Sidebar, main content, and right widget
- Footer across full width
- Use grid-template-areas for layout
- Each section with distinct background color

expectedSolution.html:
Header
Sidebar
Main Content
Widget
Footer

title: CSS Clip-path and Shapes
description: Create custom shapes using clip-path
instructions:
Create different shapes:
- Circle shape using clip-path: circle()
- Triangle using clip-path: polygon()
- Hexagon shape
- Each shape 200px, different colors
- Arrange them horizontally with flexbox

expectedSolution.html:
Circle
Triangle
Hexagon

title: CSS Filters and Backdrop Effects
description: Apply CSS filters and backdrop-filter
instructions:
Create a card with glass morphism effect:
- background: rgba with transparency
- backdrop-filter: blur(10px)
- border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2)
- box-shadow for depth
- Body background with gradient and pattern
hints: Use backdrop-filter: blur() for glass effect

expectedSolution.html:
Glass Morphism

This card uses backdrop-filter and transparency to create a modern glass effect.

title: CSS Scroll Snap
description: Create smooth scrolling sections with scroll-snap
instructions:
Build a page with scroll snap:
- Container with scroll-snap-type: y mandatory
- 4 sections, each 100vh height
- scroll-snap-align: start on sections
- Different background gradients for each
- Center content in each section

expectedSolution.html:

Scroll down to see snap effect

Section 2

Sections snap into place

Section 3

End of sections
